name: WoW TCGBrowser Card Tooltips
author: bogycoins

sections.description: The plugin adds a button in the visual post editor. To use it, just select the text that represents a WoW TCG card name, and click the button. It will turn the text into a link to the card’s page on http://wow.tcgbrowser.com. Note that the tooltips will work only after you publish or preview the post.
sections.installation:
Option 1: 1. Go to “Install Plugins” section of the Admin Panel, select “Add New” and then the “Upload” link to install the zip file. 2. Activate the plugin. 3. Use the “WoW” button in the editor.

Option 2: Alternatively, you can search for “WoW TCGBrowser” from the Admin panel Plugins section, select this plugin and click ‘Install’.

short_description: Transform WoW TCG card names into links that show the card image when hovering over them.
description: The plugin adds a button in the visual post editor. To use it, just select the text that represents a WoW TCG card name, and click the button. It will turn the text into a link to the card’s page on http://wow.tcgbrowser.com. Note that the tooltips will work only after you publish or preview the post.

screenshots.caption: Select the card name and click on the WoW icon
